description:
Volt creates vibrant and customizable lightning bolts to play practical jokes, create awesome wallpapers and duel with Jedi Force Lightning! Ranked #1 Entertainment App in 12 countries with over five million downloads!

• Play a scary prank on your friends: Set the background to a home screen picture then give your iPhone to a friend.  After touching your iPhone they will ‘freak out’ - believing they have received electric shock! Try it now!

• Become a Jedi: Choose your side Jedi or Sith, set up your lightning color and touch the screen to duel with Force Lightning.

• Create unique wallpaper: Design your own style create stunning wallpaper for the background of your phone. Touch the screen and tap the Camera button!

• Van der Graaf Generator: Simply touch your screen for exciting, 3D lightning bolts unleashed from your fingertips! 

• Stress relief: Is someone really annoying you? Do you need to vent some anger on your boss? Add a photo and electrocute them for instant satisfaction!

• Lock your iPhone: With the security mode you can lock your iPhone be safe in the knowledge that if anyone touches your device without permission, they will get the shock of a lifetime!

5 Star Reviews:

"Awesome! Literally 'Electrifying'"
"This is quality!!!!!!!"
"Great app to tease the kids!"

App Safari - "The amazing graphics are completely front and center...realistically rendered, right down to the very last spark"

APPMODO - "on the app store’s top 25 list and for good reason. This app is just simply fun!"

Experience this electrifying App! Download Volt Now!

'Like' on facebook - http://on.fb.me/voltiphone
